name: Red Pepper Flakes Chimichurri Shrimp Skewers
instructions: 1. In a small bowl, combine the red pepper flakes, parsley, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well to make the chimichurri sauce.
2. Thread the shrimp onto skewers, about 2-3 shrimp per skewer.
3. Brush the chimichurri sauce over the shrimp, making sure to coat each piece.
4. Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Cook the shrimp skewers for about 3-4 minutes per side, or until they are pink and cooked through.
5. Remove the skewers from the grill and serve immediately.
description: These Red Pepper Flakes Chimichurri Shrimp Skewers are a spicy and flavorful twist on a classic shrimp dish. The homemade red pepper flakes chimichurri sauce adds a burst of heat and freshness to the grilled shrimp.
